text: Hey team, looking to work with Kevin Baker for Hungry Jack's. Budget is approx $21,314 - need 2 x Pinterest pin, 3 x Media interview, 2 x 30-second Instagram reel, 3 x TikTok video, 3 x 15-second TikTok. 6 weeks exclusivity, 4 month engmt. Usage: 6 months. Start date: December 2025. no worries
